content: Beginning June 2, we will begin a new sermon series: “At the Table With Jesus”. Some important and meaningful conversations can happen sitting at the table and breaking bread with each other. Jesus often used meals to engage with people and teach important lessons about the kingdom of God and God’s grace. Throughout the summer, we will be “At the Table with Jesus” and see how Jesus reached out to friends, outcasts and even enemies to share God’s story of love and salvation. And we will also focus our
